mapper.insert: insert into board (title, content, member_id) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{memberId})
mapper.select: select b.id, b.title, b.content, b.reg_date, b.mod_date, b.views, u.id, u.nickname from board b left join user u on b.member_id = u.id order by b.id desc
select b.id, b.title, b.content, b.reg_date, b.mod_date, b.views, u.id, u.nickname from board b left join user u on b.member_id = u.id where b.id = ${boardId}

select b.id, b.title, b.content, b.reg_date, b.mod_date, b.views, u.id, u.nickname from board b left join user u on b.member_id = u.id where 1 = 1
and b.title like concat('%',#{data.title},'%')
and u.nickname like concat('%',#{data.nickname},'%')
order by b.id desc limit #{pageable.pageSize} offset #{pageable.offset}

select count(*) from board b left join user u on b.member_id = u.id where 1 = 1
and b.title like concat('%',#{title},'%')
and u.nickname like concat('%',#{nickname},'%')
